quote: The minute you start talking about what you’re going to do if you lose, you have lost.
author: George P. Shultz

quote: I hate to lose more than I love to win.
author: Jimmy Connors

quote: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: You Can't Lose Something You Never Had
author: Kate Hudson

quote: Play to win, not "not to lose".
author: Dondi Scumaci

quote: Without hope we are lost.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Winning vs. Losing [10w] Too often the cost of winning is losing your soul.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: You're never losing when you're learning !
author: Knowledge Notes

quote: Mostly it is loss which teaches us about the worth of things.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer,  Parerga and Paralipomena

quote: Why is the measure of love loss?
author: Jeanette Winterson,  Why Be Happy When You Could Be Normal?

quote: Stop counting your losses and start counting your blessings. Only then will you discover that losses are always easier to point out and count than blessings. And that your blessings will always outnumber your losses, for they are truly immeasurable.
author: Suzy Kassem,  Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: If you're losing your soul and you know it, then you've still got a soul left to lose
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: After you have wept and grieved for your physical losses, cherish the functions and the life you have left.
author: Morrie Schwartz

quote: It's a time of sorrow and sadness when we lose a loss of life.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Hope in the beginning feels like such a violation of the loss, and yet without it we couldn't survive.
author: Gail Caldwell,  Let's Take the Long Way Home: A Memoir of Friendship

quote: Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi

quote: Why love what you will lose?There is nothing else to love.
author: Louise Glück,  Triumph of Achilles

quote: A lesson for all of us is that for every loss, there is victory, for every sadness, there is joy, and when you think you’ve lost everything, there is hope.
author: Geraldine Solon,  The Assignment

quote: What is left when honor is lost?
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Dieting is the only game where you win when you lose!
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: It's taken me all this time, all this loss, to realize what really matters is now.
author: Suzanne Young,  The Treatment

quote: Some lose all mind and become soul,insane.some lose all soul and become mind, intellectual.some lose both and become accepted
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Doing the tough things sets winners apart from losers.
author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering: You can be successful

quote: If you win, you need not have to explain...If you lose, you should not be there to explain!
author: Adolf Hitler

quote: There are several ways to react to being lost. One is to panic: this was usually Valentina's first impulse. Another is to abandon yourself to lostness, to allow the fact that you've misplaced yourself to change the way you experience the world.
author: Audrey Niffenegger,  Her Fearful Symmetry

quote: We are all the pieces of what we remember. We hold in ourselves the hopes and fears of those who love us. As long as there is love and memory, there is no true loss.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Heavenly Fire

quote: I'm not lost for I know where I am. But however, where I am may be lost.
author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: Long before we even lose our lives, we lose our souls. Tragic but true. Some carry on—willing to make the sacrifices, putting what is perceived as important before anything else. Some tread into the dark—wasting moments of grace, letting themselves suffer from their own decisions or the other’s domination. Some continue to love, give too much, and not leave even a little love for themselves.
author: Joanne Crisner,  Brightest

quote: Lost vs. Lost We get lost twice in life.The first stems from uncertainty,when we try to find what our dreams truly are.The more profound feeling of being lost is existential, and comes unforeseen, after we finally fulfill our dreams.To survive the latter, we must create an entirely new set of dreams.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Win, lose or draw, you're all my cousins and I love you.
author: Chill Wills

quote: There is a price for everything; the price of losing or winning it all.
author: David Alexandher

quote: My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose.
author: Donald Trump

quote: It shocks me how I wish for...what is lost and cannot come back.
author: Sue Monk Kidd,  Traveling With Pomegranates: A Mother-Daughter Story

quote: I postpone death by living, by suffering, by error, by risking, by giving, by losing.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: No one loses anyone, because no one owns anyone. That is the true experience of freedom: having the most important thing in the world without owning it
author: Paulo Coelho,  Eleven Minutes

quote: Every one of us is losing something precious to us. Lost opportunities, lost possibilities, feelings we can never get back again. That’s part of what it means to be alive.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore

quote: To love and win is the best thing.To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Sharing tales of those we've lost is how we keep from really losing them.
author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day

quote: Maybe you are already lost and just do not know it.
author: Christine Feehan,  Dark Demon

quote: Lost & Found of Love We cannot forfeit what was not truly ours to begin with.You can only lose yourself in the heartbreak of love lostand find yourself againinthe miracle of love regained.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Let me lose everything on earth and the world beyond, but let me not lose what I'm craving for, let it be that i died on the way than retreating from getting it.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage

quote: You're never as good as everyone tells you when you win, and you're never as bad as they say when you lose.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: The more I love, the more I get lost in love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Last night I lost the world, and gained the universe.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: To lose one parent may be regarded as a misfortune; to lose both looks like carelessness.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You lose yourself, Erica, because with the right person, who you become together is something so much greater, more than you could even realize right now.
author: Meredith Wild,  Hardwired

quote: What and how much had I lost by trying to do only what was expected of me instead of what I myself had wished to do?
author: Ralph Ellison,  Invisible Man

quote: Failure is when you give up. A real winner is someone that doesn't give up, even when it feels like they are losing.
author: Joshua Hartzell
